Ah.\""},{"lineNumber":40198,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラはシーザーから受け取ったタオルを","translatedEnglishLine":"Satella took the towel received from Caesar"},{"lineNumber":40199,"originalJapaneseLine":"濡れそぼった髪に当て始めた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and started pressing it against her soaking wet hair."},{"lineNumber":40200,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし……こんな所で","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But... staying here like this"},{"lineNumber":40201,"originalJapaneseLine":"　足踏みしている場合じゃないぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"is no time to just be waiting around."},{"lineNumber":40202,"originalJapaneseLine":"　早くガルティアを仕留めないと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"We have to take down Galtia quickly...\""},{"lineNumber":40203,"originalJapaneseLine":"「メシを食いまくる魔人か。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A demon who gobbles down food nonstop, huh."},{"lineNumber":40204,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんか意地汚い奴を連想するが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Sounds like a greedy guy, but...\""},{"lineNumber":40205,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうでもないぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Not really."},{"lineNumber":40206,"originalJapaneseLine":"　貪欲だが……別に性格は悪くない」","translatedEnglishLine":"He's greedy, but his personality isn't bad.\""},{"lineNumber":40207,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうなんですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is that so?\""},{"lineNumber":40208,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そういえば、どんな奴か大して聞いてなかったな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Come to think of it, I hadn't really asked what kind of guy he is."},{"lineNumber":40209,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ま、男なんだろう？　どうでもいいが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, he's a man, right? Though I don't really care...\""},{"lineNumber":40210,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………聞け、敵の情報くらい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Listen, at least get the enemy's info.\""},{"lineNumber":40211,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ガルティアは……ええと。人間出身だったかな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Galtia is... um, I think he was originally human."},{"lineNumber":40212,"originalJapaneseLine":"　サテラよりかなり古株だから、よくわからん」","translatedEnglishLine":"He's older than Satella, so nobody really knows much.\""},{"lineNumber":40213,"originalJapaneseLine":"「剣使いで……使徒三匹との連係攻撃が得意だな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"He's a swordsman... good at coordinated attacks with three disciples."},{"lineNumber":40214,"originalJapaneseLine":"　他にも、よく分からない能力をいくつも持ってる。","translatedEnglishLine":"He also has several other abilities that nobody understands."},{"lineNumber":40215,"originalJapaneseLine":"　かなり危険だぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"He's pretty dangerous.\""},{"lineNumber":40216,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よくわからんじゃ何も分からんぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Not understanding him means you don't understand anything."},{"lineNumber":40217,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔法か？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Is it magic?\""},{"lineNumber":40218,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、身体から毒針とか爆弾を撃ってきたり……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, he shoots poison needles and bombs from his body..."},{"lineNumber":40219,"originalJapaneseLine":"　糸を出して絡めたり……そういうやつだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"And he produces threads to entangle you... that kind of guy.\""},{"lineNumber":40220,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだそれ。モンスターと違うか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What the hell? Isn't that like a monster?\""},{"lineNumber":40221,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……そうかもしれん。そうは見えないが」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Maybe. Though he doesn't look like one.\""},{"lineNumber":40222,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし……なんでケイブリスに付いたのか……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But... why did he side with Kayblis...?"},{"lineNumber":40223,"originalJapaneseLine":"　悪いやつじゃないんだがな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"He's not a bad guy, though...\""},{"lineNumber":40224,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうなんですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is that so?\""},{"lineNumber":40225,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……派閥戦争が始まるまではな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Until the faction war began."},{"lineNumber":40226,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やたらに気安くて、","translatedEnglishLine":"He was unusually friendly,"},{"lineNumber":40227,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔人なのが不思議なくらいだった」","translatedEnglishLine":"to the point that it was strange he was a demon.\""},{"lineNumber":40228,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも……サテラ達が仲間にしようと","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But... when Satella and the others tried to recruit him,"},{"lineNumber":40229,"originalJapaneseLine":"　声を掛けた時には、もうケイブリスに付いていた」","translatedEnglishLine":"he was already with Kayblis."},{"lineNumber":40230,"originalJapaneseLine":"「以来、聞く耳持たずだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Since then, he hasn't listened to a word.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あぁっ、わかったよっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A-ah, alright already!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒鳴り合わないと、近くの声さえ聞こえない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we don't shout at each other, we can't even hear voices nearby.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一行は雨避けに、急いでうしを走らせた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The group hurriedly drove the ox to take shelter from the rain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……洞窟と言うから天然物かと思ったが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Since they called it a cave, I thought it was natural."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「誰かが作ったダンジョンなんでしょうか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Could it be a dungeon someone made...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『ワ、ワハハ、ハハ。　味太郎迷宮へ　ヨウコソ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'W-wahaha, haha. Welcome to Ajitaro's labyrinth,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 真理ヲ求メル、者ヨ、サア奥ニ――』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who seek truth, come and venture deeper—'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、ただの雨宿りだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, just taking shelter from the rain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奥にはこれっぱかしも興味はない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm not at all interested in what's inside."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあて、しばらくは暇だな…………ん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, we've got some time to kill... hmm"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ……ふぁっ……へぷしょん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ha... fa... a-choo!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、サテラさん……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, Satella-san..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サテラ様　キチントタオルデ身体　拭イテ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Satella-sama, please properly wipe your body with the towel,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 風邪　引キマス」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or you'll catch a cold."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい……大丈夫だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... I'm fine."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……魔人も風邪なんか引くのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Do demons even catch colds?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんな訳が――――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That can't be—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひっぷし！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hic—" (sneeze sound)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ち、違うぞ！　ただ少し身体が冷えただけで――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "N-no! I just got a little cold—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ……身体は大事にしろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well... take care of your body."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むっ……ま、まあ使徒の言う事は聞いてやるのが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... well, listening to what a disciple says

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 主の度量だからな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is the mark of a lord's magnanimity!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「シーザーさん、これを」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Caesar-san, here you go."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サテラ様、ドウゾ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For Satella-sama, here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「む。ああ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mm. Ah."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラはシーザーから受け取ったタオルを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella took the towel received from Caesar

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 濡れそぼった髪に当て始めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and started pressing it against her soaking wet hair.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし……こんな所で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But... staying here like this

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 足踏みしている場合じゃないぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is no time to just be waiting around.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早くガルティアを仕留めないと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have to take down Galtia quickly..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「メシを食いまくる魔人か。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A demon who gobbles down food nonstop, huh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんか意地汚い奴を連想するが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sounds like a greedy guy, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうでもないぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Not really.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貪欲だが……別に性格は悪くない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's greedy, but his personality isn't bad."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうなんですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is that so?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そういえば、どんな奴か大して聞いてなかったな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Come to think of it, I hadn't really asked what kind of guy he is.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、男なんだろう？　どうでもいいが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, he's a man, right? Though I don't really care..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………聞け、敵の情報くらい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Listen, at least get the enemy's info."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ガルティアは……ええと。人間出身だったかな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Galtia is... um, I think he was originally human.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラよりかなり古株だから、よくわからん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's older than Satella, so nobody really knows much."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「剣使いで……使徒三匹との連係攻撃が得意だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He's a swordsman... good at coordinated attacks with three disciples.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他にも、よく分からない能力をいくつも持ってる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He also has several other abilities that nobody understands.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなり危険だぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's pretty dangerous."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よくわからんじゃ何も分からんぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Not understanding him means you don't understand anything.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法か？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is it magic?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、身体から毒針とか爆弾を撃ってきたり……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, he shoots poison needles and bombs from his body...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 糸を出して絡めたり……そういうやつだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And he produces threads to entangle you... that kind of guy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだそれ。モンスターと違うか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What the hell? Isn't that like a monster?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……そうかもしれん。そうは見えないが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Maybe. Though he doesn't look like one."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし……なんでケイブリスに付いたのか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But... why did he side with Kayblis...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪いやつじゃないんだがな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's not a bad guy, though..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうなんですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is that so?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……派閥戦争が始まるまではな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Until the faction war began.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やたらに気安くて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was unusually friendly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人なのが不思議なくらいだった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to the point that it was strange he was a demon."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも……サテラ達が仲間にしようと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But... when Satella and the others tried to recruit him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 声を掛けた時には、もうケイブリスに付いていた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he was already with Kayblis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「以来、聞く耳持たずだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since then, he hasn't listened to a word."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あぁっ、わかったよっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A-ah, alright already!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒鳴り合わないと、近くの声さえ聞こえない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we don't shout at each other, we can't even hear voices nearby.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一行は雨避けに、急いでうしを走らせた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The group hurriedly drove the ox to take shelter from the rain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……洞窟と言うから天然物かと思ったが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Since they called it a cave, I thought it was natural."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「誰かが作ったダンジョンなんでしょうか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Could it be a dungeon someone made...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『ワ、ワハハ、ハハ。　味太郎迷宮へ　ヨウコソ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'W-wahaha, haha. Welcome to Ajitaro's labyrinth,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 真理ヲ求メル、者ヨ、サア奥ニ――』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who seek truth, come and venture deeper—'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、ただの雨宿りだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, just taking shelter from the rain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奥にはこれっぱかしも興味はない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm not at all interested in what's inside."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあて、しばらくは暇だな…………ん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, we've got some time to kill... hmm"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ……ふぁっ……へぷしょん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ha... fa... a-choo!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、サテラさん……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, Satella-san..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サテラ様　キチントタオルデ身体　拭イテ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Satella-sama, please properly wipe your body with the towel,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 風邪　引キマス」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or you'll catch a cold."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい……大丈夫だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... I'm fine."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……魔人も風邪なんか引くのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Do demons even catch colds?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんな訳が――――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That can't be—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひっぷし！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hic—" (sneeze sound)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ち、違うぞ！　ただ少し身体が冷えただけで――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "N-no! I just got a little cold—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ……身体は大事にしろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well... take care of your body."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むっ……ま、まあ使徒の言う事は聞いてやるのが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... well, listening to what a disciple says

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 主の度量だからな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is the mark of a lord's magnanimity!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「シーザーさん、これを」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Caesar-san, here you go."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サテラ様、ドウゾ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For Satella-sama, here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「む。ああ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mm. Ah."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラはシーザーから受け取ったタオルを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella took the towel received from Caesar

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 濡れそぼった髪に当て始めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and started pressing it against her soaking wet hair.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし……こんな所で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But... staying here like this

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 足踏みしている場合じゃないぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is no time to just be waiting around.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早くガルティアを仕留めないと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have to take down Galtia quickly..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「メシを食いまくる魔人か。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A demon who gobbles down food nonstop, huh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんか意地汚い奴を連想するが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sounds like a greedy guy, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうでもないぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Not really.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貪欲だが……別に性格は悪くない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's greedy, but his personality isn't bad."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうなんですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is that so?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そういえば、どんな奴か大して聞いてなかったな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Come to think of it, I hadn't really asked what kind of guy he is.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、男なんだろう？　どうでもいいが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, he's a man, right? Though I don't really care..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………聞け、敵の情報くらい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Listen, at least get the enemy's info."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ガルティアは……ええと。人間出身だったかな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Galtia is... um, I think he was originally human.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラよりかなり古株だから、よくわからん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's older than Satella, so nobody really knows much."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「剣使いで……使徒三匹との連係攻撃が得意だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He's a swordsman... good at coordinated attacks with three disciples.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他にも、よく分からない能力をいくつも持ってる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He also has several other abilities that nobody understands.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなり危険だぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's pretty dangerous."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よくわからんじゃ何も分からんぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Not understanding him means you don't understand anything.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔法か？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is it magic?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、身体から毒針とか爆弾を撃ってきたり……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, he shoots poison needles and bombs from his body...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 糸を出して絡めたり……そういうやつだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And he produces threads to entangle you... that kind of guy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだそれ。モンスターと違うか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What the hell? Isn't that like a monster?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……そうかもしれん。そうは見えないが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Maybe. Though he doesn't look like one."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし……なんでケイブリスに付いたのか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But... why did he side with Kayblis...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪いやつじゃないんだがな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's not a bad guy, though..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうなんですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is that so?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……派閥戦争が始まるまではな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Until the faction war began.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やたらに気安くて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was unusually friendly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人なのが不思議なくらいだった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to the point that it was strange he was a demon."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも……サテラ達が仲間にしようと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But... when Satella and the others tried to recruit him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 声を掛けた時には、もうケイブリスに付いていた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he was already with Kayblis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「以来、聞く耳持たずだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since then, he hasn't listened to a word."
